DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX 6 Color Palette - Monster (10 g)
DescriptionData.Description: Diamond FX 6 Color Monster Palette includes strongly pigmented water-based face paint in 6 Monster colors, 10 gm each. 10 gm palettes are easily refillable. Colors included are: Colors included are: Spirit Blue, Ogre Green, Blood Red, Puss Yellow, Soot Grey, Black Eye Purple; perfect for creating intimidating monster designs. Diamond FX 6 Color Palette also includes one #3 Round Brush and one #2 Flat Brush.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes high quality water-based face paint in 6 colors, 10 grams each.
Includes colors: Spirit Blue, Ogre Green, Blood Red, Puss Yellow, Soot Grey, Black Eye Purple. Also includes a #3 Round Brush and a #2 Flat Brush.
FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving on the skin too long.
Apply either with a sponge or a brush. Requires only a small amount of water. Removes easily with soap and water.
Perfect for line work, blending or layering.
